name: Travis Patterson
message: Sourcery seeks to inspire and educate the students giving them the opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills.

name: Meri Navickė
message: The Academy has been the steepest learning curve I have ever experienced. Being immersed into a project development gives a possibility to learn fast and improve your coding skills daily. Learning to not only build the application, but do so using the best practices, as well as having constant support of the mentor, these are the reasons I would recommend this intense program to any aspiring front-end developer.

name: Cristina Nueva
message: I had a great experience collaborating with my team utilizing Agile methodology.

name: Sara Benks
message: Sourcery for Developers improved my ASP.NET and React.js skills and taught me how to build a successful project working with a team.

name: Giuliano Sevele
message: Sourcery for Developers helped me to become a better JAVA developer.

name: Jon Moore
message: Sourcery for Testers seeks to inspire and educate the students giving them the opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills.

name: Kuki Jong
message: During the 3 month academy we managed to learn not only the basics, but also to solve more serious issues. I am glad that I chose to apply and challenge myself. I would definitely recommend to apply for anyone who’s interested in testing.

name: Lucas Celab
message: I really enjoyed working with the team using agile principles.

name: Aidas Buivydas
message: Sourcery Academy's front-end courses are straight fire! And did you know the programmer's code look so clean? Because it had only the 'nice-to-have' comments.

name: Albertas Rinkevičius
message: Sourcery for Front-End Academy is intense professional Front-End development course. I learned from Front-End software development professionals. The lectures cover the latest technologies and how to create applications using the best tools on the market. During the Academy I discover advanced techniques and design approaches in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Accessibility as well as manage projects using the Agile methods. I had real work experience in team creating project. I recommend Sourcery for Front-End Academy who want start career in software development. Also, a huge thanks to our mentor Sigita and all the wonderful lecturers.

name: Aistė Gerdzevičiūtė
message: The Sourcery Academy was an intense and challenging experience, but also one of the most rewarding. The students shared their knowledge and helped each other out. The mentor and lecturers were experts in their field and truly dedicated to our success. I feel incredibly fortunate to have been a part of this program and would recommend it to anyone looking to take their development skills to the next level.
